titles.title: A resolution congratulating Army Reserve Major Lisa Jaster on her graduation from the Army Ranger School.
A resolution congratulating Army Reserve Major Lisa Jaster on her graduation from the Army Ranger School.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Honors Major Lisa Jaster for becoming the first Army Reserve woman and first mother to graduate from Ranger School.
Commends the groundbreaking achievements of the first three women to graduate from Ranger School, Captain Kristen Griest, First Lieutenant Shaye Haver, and Major Lisa Jaster.
Recognizes the Army Reserve's vital role in defending the United States.
Celebrates the determination, patriotism, and willingness to lead of all Ranger School graduates.
